name: Banjaxed
description: Primary attacks have a 27%~33% chance to Drench, Oil, Chill, or Poison enemies (82,000~111,000 Damage every second), for 8.16~10.01 seconds.

name: Favorable Winds
description: 1,640%~2,220% of your active Movement Speed is added to your Hero Damage. Player grows faster by 60 for each Primary attack kill (max 10 times); resets when stationary.

name: Grave Infection
description: Enemies killed have a 16.05%~20% chance of spawning a pirate skeleton that lasts for 15.52~20 seconds. It poisons surrounding enemies dealing 443,243~600,000 damage over 10 seconds.

name: Grog-a-tov

name: Hurricane
description: While moving above 1700 Speed, your Primary attacks deal 14,775~20,000 Storm damage.

name: Knot Stopping
description: While moving above 1700 Speed, you will drench and deal 36,937~50,000 Water damage every 2 seconds.

name: Shackled

name: To Arms

name: Turn the Tides
description: Hero deals 234%~300% of the health recovered over the past 5 seconds as Area damage.

name: Walk the Plank

name: Canyon Bells
description: Enemies on death have a 15%~20% chance to spawn a bell that does 739%~1000% of your Ability Power as damage to all nearby enemies every second for 3 seconds and stuns them for 2 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 2 seconds.

name: Cyclostrophic Wind
description: Your attacks generate 1 tornado stack. At 5 stacks you launch a tornado forward, dealing 4,695%~6,000% of your Ability Power as damage to up to 10 enemies and sending airborne. The effect has a cooldown of 3 seconds.

name: Genie Kings Curse

name: Sand Path

hero: Apprentice, Adept, Huntress, Monk, Ev2, Gunwitch, Mystic, Initiate

name: Sand Storm

name: Sky Dragon's Fury
description: Secondary attacks spawn a lightning ball dealing 50.5%~65% Ability Power as Storm Damage 2.5 times a second for 5.55~7 seconds. Occurs every 8 seconds.

name: Curse of the Rattlesnake
description: 15%~20% chance on hit to poison a target for 152%~200% of your Hero Damage stat as magical poison damage each second for 2.47s~3s when the poison expires it stuns the target for 2s.

name: Desert's Shadow
description: Once every 5 seconds, your primary attack spawns a shadow entity that bounces between nearby enemies dealing 1052%~1400% of your ability power as damage.

name: Midas Touch
description: On hit, enemies move at 61%~50% of their original speed and burn for 63%~80% of your Hero Damage stat a second for 3.95~5 seconds.

name: Radiant Heat
description: +15%~20% Chance on taking damage to spawn a flame shield that lasts for 3.95~5 seconds reflecting back 369.5%~500% of the damage before resistance as Fire Damage back to the target.

name: Runaway Mine Cart
description: Primary attacks have an 15.65%~20% chance to spawn a minecart dealing 384%~500% of your Hero Damage stat and knocking enemies back.

name: Goat Launcher
description: Once every 2 seconds, your attacks spawn a flying goat that explodes on impact dealing 739%~1000% of your Hero Damage as Fire damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Overclock
description: Gain up to +19%~25% Crit Chance and +46%~60% Crit Damage while gaining heat.

name: Anti Heal Chip
description: Reduce Healing of enemies by 70%~100% for 15 seconds.

name: Pre-emptive Strike Chip
description: After not dealing or taking damage for 5 seconds your next attack deals 66.51%~100% more damage and is a guaranteed Crit.

name: Healthy Crit Chip
description: +8%~10% Crit Chance and +19.73%~25% Crit Damage when at 90%+ Health.

name: Air Superiority Chip
description: While in the Air, Primary Attacks deal 19%~25% more damage.

name: Axearang
description: Once every 2 seconds, your attacks spawn a flying Pickaxe that pierces enemies and returns to you dealing 186%~250% of your Hero Damage as Physical damage to all enemies hit.

name: Gold Rush
description: Gain 860~1150 Hero Damage for each enemy killed; resets when damaged.

name: Metamorphosis
description: After taking damage, take 6.55%~8% less damage from further attacks for 5 seconds, Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Molten Cage
description: 10% chance on hit to trap the enemy in a cage of fire, stunning them for 3 seconds and dealing 443,243~600,000 fire damage over 5 seconds.

name: Shift Rotation
description: +30.77%~40% Hero Damage and Ability Power for 10 seconds after swapping in. Afterwards, reduce Hero Damage and Ability Power by 25% until swapped out.

name: Lucky Strikes
description: +6,085~8,260 Hero Damage and Ability Power each time you Critical Strike. Resets on non-Crits. ( Max Stacks 15 )

name: Blood Craze
description: When damaging an enemy, you have an 8.42~10% chance to charm them for 3 seconds. Then, they explode, dealing 1,710~2,000% of your Ability Power as damage to up to ten other enemies. 10 second cooldown.

name: Spectral Vanishing
description: After taking damage from an enemy, you have an 16.05~20% chance to become invisible to enemies for 5 seconds. 15 second cooldown.

name: Spicy Garlic
description: Enemies killed have an 16.05~20% chance of spawning 'spicy garlic' that lasts for 15.52~20 seconds. Spicy garlic poisons surrounding enemies dealing 1,720~2,300% of your Ability Power as damage over 10 seconds.

name: Vampiric Embrace
description: Gives you a life-stealing aura, dealing 73,768~100,000 damage to up to 10 enemies within it. Heals for 1.47~2% of damage dealt.

name: Wrath of the Bat
description: You gain 18.41~25% jump height. While in the air, attacks deal 16~20% more damage.

name: Icy Fury
description: Each consecutive hit of ice shards deals 39.45~50% more damage. Can stack up to 2 times.

name: Drenched Power Chip
description: +47.67~70% damage to drenched enemies.

name: Raging Rapids
description: +?~?% hero damage for each quarter of missing maximum health.

name: Rogue Wave
description: Primary attacks have an 7.83-10% chance to spawn a Rogue Wave dealing ?~760% of your Hero Damage stat and knock enemies back.

name: Tidal Trifecta
description: Every third primary attack increases the next attack damage by 63~80%.

name: Water Pool
description: Generates a pool around you that deals 116~150% of your Hero Damage as Water Damage to nearby enemies every second.

name: Earth Counter Chip
description: 58.88%~80% damage to Earth Elementals.

name: Electric Counter Chip
description: 58.88%~80% damage to Electric Elementals.

name: Elite Counter Chip
description: 82.37%~110% damage to Elite Elementals.

name: Fire Counter Chip
description: 58.88%~80% damage to Fire Elementals.

name: Water Counter Chip
description: 58.88%~80% damage to Water Elementals.

name: Frost Fire
description: Abilities apply frost fire to enemies on hit for 234%-300% of your Ability Power as magical frost damage each second for 5s frostbite enemies are slowed by 25%.

name: Overheat Chip
description: Up to 30.58%~50% FlameThrower Damage while Overheating.
